issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: hdfs dfs -setfacl error message is misleading

comments.body: Rev01: added more accurate error message.

No test cases are attached, because it's a message-only patch.
Rev02: Added another scenario: hdfs dfs -setfacl should also emit error message if none of the expected options (-x, -m, -b, -k, --set) appear. Added test cases for the new scenario.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Hadoop-trunk-Commit #10030 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/10030/])
HDFS-9852. hdfs dfs -setfacl error message is misleading (Wei-Chiu (aw: rev b3649adf6a1b2dc47566b4b0d652bd4e0a6a8056)
* hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/shell/AclCommands.java
* hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/test/java/org/apache/hadoop/fs/shell/TestAclCommands.java
I cherry-picked this to branch-2 and branch-2.8.
Thanks [~aw] and [~cnauroth] for committing the patch!
